query.text: Load single-arm pick-and-place experiment from 'knowrob_data' library

query.q: owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'StorageConstruct'), class_properties(T, knowrob:'typePrimaryFunction-StoragePlaceFor', knowrob:'Perishable'), owl_individual_of(Obj, T), highlight_object_with_children(Obj).
query.text: What is the storage place for perishable items?
----- Queries on the robot's logged belief state -----

query.q: task(T), task_goal(T, '(OBJECT-PLACED-AT ?OBJ ?LOC)'), task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E), add_trajectory('/base_link', S, E, 1.0).
query.text: Which path did the PR2 follow during the pick-and-place task?

query.q: findall(E, (task_goal(T,'PUTDOWN'), task_end(T, E)), Es), member(E, Es),  mng_lookup_transform('/base_link', '/map', E, Transform), add_robot_as_basic_semantic_instance(Transform, E, Inst), add_object(Inst), highlight_object(Inst).
query.text: Where did it stand during the PUT-DOWN actions?

query.q:
findall([Obj, E], 
 ((task_end(T,E), task_type(T,knowrob:'UIMAPerception'), rdf_has(T, knowrob:'perceptionResult', Obj))), 
 Objs),!, member([Obj, E], Objs), belief_at(loc(Obj,Loc), E), 
 add_object_as_semantic_instance(Obj, Loc, E, SemanticMapInstance), 
 add_object_with_children(SemanticMapInstance).
query.text: Where have objects been perceived during the task?
What was the pose of the PR2 at the end of the PUTDOWN action?

query.q:
task_goal(T, 'PUTDOWN'), 
 subtask_all(T, Sub),
 owl_has(Sub, knowrob:'voluntaryMovementDetails', D),
 mng_designator_props(D, 'LINK', Link),
 task_start(T, St), task_end(T, E),
 atomic_list_concat(['/', Link], TfLink), add_trajectory(TfLink, St, E, 0.1).
query.text: What was the arm trajectory during the PUTDOWN action?

query.q:
task_goal(T, 'GRASP'),
 subtask_all(T, SubL),
 owl_has(SubL, knowrob:graspDetails, DL),
 mng_designator_props(DL, 'SIDE', 'LEFT'),
 subtask_all(T, SubR),
 owl_has(SubR, knowrob:graspDetails, DR),
 mng_designator_props(DR, 'SIDE', 'RIGHT'),
 task_start(T, S), task_end(T, E),
 add_trajectory('l_wrist_roll_link', S, E, 0.3),
 add_trajectory('r_wrist_roll_link', S, E, 0.3).
query.text: What were the trajectories of both arms in a dual-handed GRASP action?

query.q:
findall(Type-Num, (owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'CRAMFailure'),
 rdf_split_url(_, Type, T),findall(F, failure_type(F, T), Failures),
 length(Failures, Num)), Distrib),pairs_keys_values(Distrib, Types, Nums),
 add_diagram(errordist, 'Error distribution', piechart, xlabel, ylabel, 350, 350, '11px', [[Types, Nums]]).
query.text: Show occurences of typical error types in the chart
